1.content: Did they find or make the machine and where was it found/made?
1.title: The big questions to start the story

11.content:
Mayuri Kurotsuchi
Nemu Kurotsuchi
Yachiru
Soifon
11.title: Who made it?

111.content:
Mayuri Kurotsuchi,12th division captain and chief of research and development, made a body swapping machine capable of swapping the bodies of 2-4 people in the world of the living, soul society, or Hueco Mundo.
Who are this first targets?
111.title: Mayuri

1113.content: Is it an arrancar that Mayuri captured?
1113.title: others

11132.content: Maybe he swaps the bodies of a person in Karakura Town with a person in the Soul Society?
11132.title: No

111321.content: Okay then. But who will he test it on first?
111321.title: Yes

1113211.content:
By locking onto the reiatsu of two individuals, the machine would be able to swap their bodies, regardless of whether they were here in the Soul Society or in the world of the living.

Now, he would have to test the machine's full extent. "The easiest target in the world of the living would obviously be that Substitute Shinigami, whats-his-name Kurosaki." he said setting the machine for its first target. It took mere seconds for him to get the proper lock, as Ichigo never bothered to suppress his reiatsu properly. "Now, who shall the second target be?" he wondered to himself a loud, deciding whoever he got the first lock on would do. The members of the 13 Squads all were much better at properly controlling the their reiatsu, so it took a few minutes before he got one. The reiatsu that the machine had managed to lock onto was none other than the Captain of Squad 2, Soi Fon, who was currently training as she appeared on the monitor. "Now, just have to initiate the process and watch as I gather the research material for this results of this experiment..." he said, typing in the commands of the machine.

---

Ichigo was on his way home from to school by himself. It had been a few days since he had regained his powers and agreed to return to his duties as a Substitute Shinigami. As he did, he suddenly found himself paralyzed and unable to move. "What the hell!?" he let out, and then suddenly he felt a power jolt through his body and blacked out.

---

In the Soul Society, Soi Fon was currently in her private training ground, practicing her techinques, when suddenly she was unable to move, and felt a powerful jolt as he suddenly blacked out.
1113211.title: Ichigo and Soi Fon

1113212.content: ok, how about Yoruichi and Momo?
1113212.title: Someone else

11132122.content: How about Toshiro and Momo?
11132122.title: More

111321222.content: How about Ichigo and Rukia?
111321222.title: No

111322.content: How about Renji and Rukia?
111322.title: The Beauty and the Beast

11133.content: How about a zanpakuto spirit?
11133.title: Zanpakuto spirit?

113.content:
Yachiru's P.O.V.

I just came back from squad 12 ‘cause clown-face told me he'd give me some odd looking stuff if I left for the rest of the day. The stuff looks cool, so I said yes. Now I'm bored ‘cause Kenny just left for a meeting and I promised not to go to squad 12. Might as well play with this stuff.

Third person P.O.V.

Yachiru played with the old machines for a few minutes, then one of them released a little electricity, and that started a chain reaction, soon they were all generating electricity, and they zapped Yachiru. She fell down and…
113.title: Yachiru

1131.content:
Ichigo just started Summer break and not even his idiot father could ruin his mood. Until, Isshin Kurosaki burst into his room and yelled,“Ichigo! I'm going to a doctors convention in Tokyo for a week and I'm taking the girls with me! It's time you learn to take care of a house while by yourself! And furthermore…” But Ichigo had enough and kicked him out of his room yelling back,“I get it! I'll be home alone!”

---1 hour later---

Ichigo just said goodbye to his family and kicked his dad when he started crying about ‘My baby boy is growing up!’, went inside, locked the door, suddenly he felt a horrible pain, so he clutched his head, and fell down.
1131.title: Who shall we continue with?

11311.content:
Ichigo's P.O.V.

‘What the hell just happened?’ I thought as I was getting up, then I realized something felt odd. I looked down and I screamed out of shock. I was wearing shinigami robes, the armband of a lieutenant (that said in Kanji ‘11’), I had pink hair, and most shocking I was a lot shorter. Someone must've heard because the next thing I knew Kenpachi Zaraki broke the door down and asked, “Are you alright Yachiru?”
11311.title: Ichigo's P.O.V.

1133.content: How about Byakuya Kuchiki? The dignified captain of the 6th Division?
1133.title: Contrasting Personalities

114.content: Did Soifon create the machine on purpose, or by accident?
114.title: Was it…

1141.content:
Soifon decided to break into squad 12, or more specifically Mayuri Kurotsuchi's lab (one of the most heavily guarded places), to ensure that her skills were still as sharp as ever. When she saw the blueprints of a machine, one look at them and she decided this machine should be used for a spy/assassin, not for whatever reason Mayuri Kurotsuchi had…






BIG QUESTION BEFORE YOU CONTINUE, DID AIZEN, GIN, AND TOUSEN REBEL YET?
1141.title: The machine for a spy/assassin…

choices: She used herself as one of the two test subjects
She used two different people as test subjects
11411.content: ‘Perhaps this body switching device could help us win the war…’ Soifon was thinking to herself as she was building the machine in one of squad 2's private rooms. She kept thinking of the many ability's the machine could give: she could swap one of the most loyal (and best actor) Soul Reaper and swap with one of Aizen's arrancar to gain information or assassination. Then, about a few hours later, she finished building the body swapping machine and wanted to test it…
11411.title: The tool for a war...

122.content: Aizen called a meeting for all of the Arrancars in Los Noches explained part of his plan, asked kindly (ordered) one of the Arrancars to accept.
122.title: Aizen

choices: One of the segunda espada's fraccions
1222.title: A fraccion

122211.content:
Lilinette, wanting to prove herself, steps out and yells so all can hear, “Lord Aizen, I accept! I will leave my body, control an enemy's body, even let him/her control mine for as long as it takes!” Stark was staring at her in shock, but she didn't care, she wanted to ensure they (Stark and herself) would never be alone again. Aizen was just giving his normal smile, Gin was giving his normal grin and keeping his eyes in slits, and Kaname Tousen was saying how good she was for willing to go that far for justice. Aizen then said,“Very well, and thank you for accepting this mission.”

--------1 hour later--------

Lilinette was staring at a blade, they decided to use a blade that can swap bodies, that seemed to glow brighter the more she concentrated, Stark whispered in her (not for long ) ear, “You don't have to do this, you know.” Lilinette without taking her eyes of the blade said,“I know, but I don't want to risk ever being alone again, so I'm doing this for us.” Stark stared at her shocked that she would say that, but he also felt touched that she cared for him as much as he cared for her. Then Szayel-Apporo Granz entered the room and said, “It's ready.” Just as he said this Lilinette's body fell over and the sword stopped getting brighter, Stark without a thought went over and picked up the body that spent all those years with him in the desert of Hueco Mundo, that woke him up, and beat him up; the light seemed to be gone from her eyes, but he knew her very being was in that sword. He suddenly felt a surge of anger that that sword took her away from him, and someone else would be in control of the body he came to love as a sister, he never met _____ ______, and no one here knows what he's/she's like when he's/she's not fighting. He almost grabbed the sword by the hilt be closer to Lilinette one last time before she left and took control of an enemy, hopefully temporarily, before he remembered the first person to touch the blade would enter Lilinette's (former?) body and she would enter theirs. So he left it alone, so he went to tie Liline-no-____'s body up, so when she (from now on I will call Lilinette and whomever she swapped with by the gender of their body's)

Who did Lilinette swap bodies with?
122211.title: Lilinette

1222111.content:
--------after Ichigo picks up the sword--------Lilinette's P.O.V.-------

Lilinette opened his eyes and said in a voice that she never heard before, 'Damn, I hope that worked or I got this killer migraine for nothing." As soon as he finished, his eyes widened, he realized it worked, and some flashes from Ichigo's life flashed in front of his eyes; not much but enough so he wouldn't act suspicious.

-------Ichigo's P.O.V.-----

Ichigo woke to see a dark and cold room, the cold wouldn't of bothered her so much if she was in her human (clothes covering most of the body) body, but as this wasn't even her body (at least that morning when Lilinette was getting dressed) Ichigo was freezing as the clothing she was currently wearing was only covering two areas. Then Ichigo realized she had a mask on and a piece of her felt like it was'gone! Ichigo then yelled, 'What the damn hell is going on?!?!' As soon as she finished yelling this, her eyes widened'and she looked down to see her new body; and then she screamed out of shock and a man with a goatee, somehow a mix of laziness/fear/and fatigue on his face, and a tattoo of the number '1' on his hand appeared.
1222111.title: Question chapter

12221111.content: Do you want to skip Stark explaining what happened to Ichigo, or do you want to read about it and her angry yells?
12221111.title: Ichigo's P.O.V.

122211111.content: Stark saw she was done trying to kill him so he released her. Ichigo muttered,“Thanks.” while rubbing her wrist (it was chaffed a little because Ichigo was struggling against what was holding her there). Stark puts a hand on her shoulder and asks, “Do you want to explore Los Noches or take a nap?” Ichigo answers,“…
122211111.title: Skip it

1222111111.content:
Ichigo answered, "I'd like to look around." Stark nodded and started walking.

----1 hour later----

Stark was showing Ichigo around Los Noches, careful to avoid mentioning/showing any exits. They already met some of the arrancar (some of which Ichigo thought were nice, while others Ichigo hated. Especially the 5th espada, Nnoritora made sure to insult Ichigo in every way he could think of; some were childish like: ‘Ha ha! You're a girl! Ha ha!’ another one he didn't even say anything and Ichigo hated him: when Stark and Ichigo were leaving, he took his hand and pulled on Ichigo's shorts(?) or are they panties(?) and let them hit Ichigo's legs; by the time she turned around he already left, so Ichigo had to catch up to Stark.) Soon they were visiting the labs, and one of the newer arrancar their accidentally tripped and he was carrying a jar with a green liquid in it, it looked like it was going to fall on Ichigo then…
1222111111.title: Explore

12221111111.content: …the weird liquid fell onto Ichigo's new head, the liquid was in a glass container and should've just given her a headache, but because of her mask fragment it broke and shattered all over her body, soaking her. Stark saw this and asked, “What is that stuff?” while Ichigo was grumbling with a scowl on her face. The arrancar who dropped it said,“ It's…
12221111111.title: What is it?

122211111111.content:
As soon as he said this however, he remembered that Lilinette was now in Ichigo Kurosaki's body and he was in hers. He paled and sonido'd away, knowing that Stark wouldn't want anyone to see her nude, especially someone they've never met before, and now because of him that would happen now or very soon.

------Stark P.O.V.-------

‘Damn it!’ Stark thought, unaware that Ichigo was thinking the same thing. Stark thought about it he knew Ichigo would eventually see her new body nude, but he didn't think it would happen so soon. Ichigo was thinking the same thing not wanting to see her body nude. Ichigo turned to Stark and nearly yelled in her new voice, “You have to be joking! Why the damn hell did that jar fall on my head!?!?” then in a more hopeful voice she asked, “Do you have ways to clean people and their clothes without getting undressed?” Stark was, pleasantly, suprised to hear this; this meant that Ichigo probably wasn't a pervert like person, and the blush on her face showed how embarrassing the idea of showering/bathing in her new body. Stark shook his head to clear his thoughts and reply ‘no’ to Ichigo's question. After she saw this she started cursing under her breath then suggested, “What if I don't bathe, then I don't have to see…myself…nude?” Stark would've thought this was a good idea, but then her body would get sick, and he didn't want that to happen. After voicing this to Ichigo (they were both on the way to Stark and Liline-no-Ichigo's quarters) Ichigo replied angrily, “Then I'm going to either shower or take a bath, which one should I do?” Stark thought about it, ‘Hmmm… If she takes a bath the water would distort the image so she won't get a clear view of everything, but Ichigo will still get to see alot; a shower would make it harder to see her body but it will be clearer.’ after a minute of waiting Stark answered, “You should…
122211111111.title: "...just hollow blood, it'll wash out.

1222111111112.content:
“…take a bath.” Stark answered, Ichigo turned to him and understood; the water would distort the image and make it hard to get a clear view of her body.

----(Time Skip)---5 minutes later------

Ichigo was filling the bathtub with water, after it reached a considerable amount, Ichigo sighed and took her clothes off, bundled them up, opened the door, and handed them to Stark who was waiting for them. Ichigo looked down at the water and put one of her toes in it slowly and…
1222111111112.title: Embarrassing chapter

12221111111122.content: Was the water a perfect temperature?
12221111111122.title: other

122211111111222.content: Was the water too cold?
122211111111222.title: Ice cold?

1222111111112222.content: Did someone enter the room?
1222111111112222.title: Awkward question.

122211111111222211.content: Ichigo put a toe in the water, thought it was a good temperature, and was about to get into the bath tub. But then the door opened a little and Ichigo yelled in her new voice, “Don't come in!” When the door was still opening, Ichigo saw a towel on the towel rack, jumped towards it, and covered a decent amount of her body before the person walked in and could see anything.
122211111111222211.title: Who is it?

1222111111112222111.content: Stark entered the room and when Ichigo saw it was him, she yelled at the top of her lungs, 'What the god-damned hell are you doing in here?!?' Stark'
1222111111112222111.title: What...the...Hell?

12221111111122221112.content: Did Stark decide to tell Ichigo about his past? (You know about being alone and his only company was Lilinette)
12221111111122221112.title: The past?

12221111111122221121.content:
Ichigo's one visible eye went wide as she stared at the man at the top of the Shinigami's most hated list. Aizen looked down at her with his ever-famous smirk in place, the smirk only marginally growing when he noticed that Ichigo's legs were slightly trembling.

Ichigo scowled when she realized this, 'Damn it! Why is Aizen here?'

Aizen spoke as if answering Ichigo's thoughts, "You must be wondering why I am here, Ichigo Kurosaki."

Ichigo jumped a little bit, 'What the hell? Is he a mind reader?'

Aizen continued, ignoring Ichigo's jump, "I have come here to see that you have been properly been...welcomed to Los Noches and its inhabitants."

Ichigo scowled as she thought about the treatment she received from Nnoritra earlier that day. Aizen's voice broke her out of her thoughts, "I have also come here to ensure that you understand why you are here. You see, when you picked up that zanpakutō, the essence of Lilynette Gingerbuck that we had sealed inside of that blade was forced into your body. As a body can only handle so many souls at once, the normal number being one, your soul was forced to find a new vessel. We took precautions so that there would be no chance of your essence disappearing, or finding a different vessel, so that you would end up in this body. And now that you're in this body, you are Lilynette Gingerbuck in every way, right down to the reiatsu."

Ichigo scowled, clenching the towel she was holding, "What's the point of this? Why are you telling me this?"
12221111111122221121.title: Yes

122211111111222211212.content: Does Aizen intend to kill the weakened Ichigo?
122211111111222211212.title: Die

1222111111112222112121.content:
Aizen smirked, "Why, this was all to make you weaker in order to kill you, to ensure that the reiatsu of Ichigo Kurosaki is loyal to me, and to motivate my primera espada. After all, vengeance is a wonderful motivator. Who wouldn't seek revenge after welcoming an enemy into their private chambers, only for said enemy to kill himself. With the body of the person that Stark cares for the most dead, and Lilynette unable to return to her body, both of them will be thrown into a rage against all things shinigami."

Ichigo backed herself into a corner, subconsciously gripping the towel closer to herself, her legs trembling with fear, and the single visible eye wide with fear as Aizen stepped closer to her, drawing Kyōka Suigetsu, "Farewell, and thank you, Ichigo Kurosaki."
1222111111112222112121.title: The true plot revealed

choices: Yes, he doesn't want anything to happen to Lilynette's body
12221111111122221121211.title: The lazy primera

122211111111222211212111.content:
Aizen's blade swung down, with the intent to kill Ichigo, only to hit air instead.

Sensing a large amount of hatred directed at him, Aizen turned around to see Stark holding Ichigo. Ichigo was staring up at the Primera with palpable shock, but said arrancar was focused on Aizen.

Stark snarled, "You wanted me to become enraged at anything shinigami related? I'll show you enraged!"

With that, Stark fired a cero at Aizen before the man could respond. Stark then grabbed the clothes Ichigo had discarded on the floor before using his sonido to flee Los Noches.

Once outside of Aizen's stronghold, Ichigo, still clutching the towel to cover her new body, got to her feet. Turning around, she saw Stark hold something out, "Put them on."

Taking the items, Ichigo saw that it was the same clothing that decorated her body before her encounter with Aizen.

She heard Stark sigh, "What do you think we should do now?"

Ichigo snapped her head up, "What, you're asking me?"

Stark blinked, reminded himself that it wasn't Lilynette in from of him, no matter how much it sounded like her, before he answered, "I can guess that Aizen was only using me for my power, and Lilynette is more important to me than Aizen is anyway. Now that we fled Los Noches, Aizen will be hunting us soon, so...what do you think we should do?"

Ichigo shook her head, "I don't know. You have any ideas."

Stark nodded, "Yeah, we can go to the World of the Living and warn Lilynette, but Aizen is probably expecting that, we can hide out in the desert, it's so big that we'll be able to hide, but it's in Aizen's territory, and we'll be on our own, or...I guess we can try Soul Society. If we remain hidden from the shinigami, we may be safe."

Ichigo tilted her head to the side, "Why don't we just tell Soul Society what's going on? They may be able to help us."

Stark sighed, "What do you want to do?"
122211111111222211212111.title: Stark doesn't like liars

1222111111112222112121112.content: How about the Soul Society?
1222111111112222112121112.title: Shinigami

12221111111122221121211122.content: Will they hide in the desert?
12221111111122221121211122.title: Wander the desert

122211111111222211212111222.content: Do Aizen's arrancar catch them while they're thinking about what to do?
122211111111222211212111222.title: Arrancar

1222111111112222112121112222.content: Do they run into shinigami due to Lilynette?
1222111111112222112121112222.title: Shinigami?

12221111111122221121211122221.content: Is it because Aizen told her to trick Ichigo's allies into going to Hueco Mundo, or because they found out and came to rescue the real Ichigo?
12221111111122221121211122221.title: Yes

12221111111122221121211122222.content: Shall we skip ahead a few years?
12221111111122221121211122222.title: Time skip?

1222111111112222112121112222211.content:
Ichigo was screaming as she ran through the Seireitei, passing various Soul Reapers, who turned their heads to pretend they didn't hear or see her as she ran by, not that Ichigo cared or noticed.

Ichigo heard someone scream, "Ichigo! I don't care if you're a little girl now! Fight me!"

Ichigo looked back to scream, "No way in hell, Kenpachi!"

Ichigo kept running as the fight hungry captain chased after her.

While running, Ichigo couldn't help but think about how all of this happened. After swapping bodies with Lilynette, Stark and Lilynette defected to join the Soul Reapers, and with their help, defeated Aizen and his army. Gin Ichimaru was the one who actually killed Aizen though, surprising everyone, and earning a lessened punishment as a result. Tousen was killed in battle. Unfortunately, the body swap technology was destroyed, leaving Ichigo trapped in Lilynette's body. Lilynette decided to live out Ichigo's life, because he felt guilty and decided to help out in case a way to swap them back is ever discovered, much to the current male's annoyance.

Of course, Ichigo's family found out about the swap, and after a lot of tears, anger, and threats, Karin and Yuzu accepted the situation. Isshin just acts like everything is normal, but is secretly hoping to fix this.

Since Hollows need either spirit particles or souls to survive, Ichigo could not live in the World of the Living, and thus moved to Seireitei, where she lives in the 13th squad. She still visits her sisters though, and is friends with Stark and Lilynette, along with all the other Soul Reaper friends she made.

While Ichigo was running away from Kenpachi, she noticed something red, and with a start, screamed, "RENJI!"

Renji, her red-haired friend, turned to look at where he heard someone calling his name, and his jaw dropped when he saw Ichigo running towards him while being chased by Kenpachi.

Renji dropped the paperwork he was holding, and searched his pockets for a smoke bomb that he...borrowed...from Soifon the last time he was drunk.

Once he found it, he threw it on the ground, and a thick smoke cloud appeared.

Inside the smoke cloud, Renji grabbed Ichigo and ran into a nearby building.

What was the building?
1222111111112222112121112222211.title: New Lives

12221111111122221121211122222111.content:
Ichigo let out a sigh of relief, "Thanks, Renji. I owe you one."

Renji snorted, "Damn right you owe me."

Ichigo rolled her eyes, "I know, I just said that."

A new voice spoke up, "Ichigo? Renji? What are you guys doing here?"

They turned to see that it was...
12221111111122221121211122222111.title: Hot springs

122211111111222211212111222221111.content:
Ichigo waved, "Hey, Lilynette, what's up?"

Lilynette shrugged, "Not much, just came by to see how Stark's doing. He's such a lazy bastard."

Ichigo snorted, "True. So, what are you going to do now?"

Lilynette answered, "I was planning on relaxing in the hot springs here."

Ichigo and Renji blinked, "Hot springs?"

Lilynette looked confused, "Wait, you didn't know this was a hot springs?"

They both shook their heads.

Lilynette said, "Well, you want to join me? We could catch up."
122211111111222211212111222221111.title: Lilynette in Ichigo's body

1222111111112222112121112222211112.content: Do either Ichigo or Renji leave?
1222111111112222112121112222211112.title: Only one?

122211111111222211212111222221111211.content:
Renji shrugs, "Relaxing in a hot springs actually sounds pretty good right about now."

Ichigo says, "Sorry, but I can't. I'm running from Kenpachi, and if he finds out that I'm here, he'll break down the walls, and I'll probably have to work to pay it off like last time. So, I have to keep moving."

Lilynette shrugs, "Suit yourself."

Turning to face Renji, Lilynette asks, "So, should we go to the mixed room or the men-only room?"

Renji answers...
122211111111222211212111222221111211.title: Just 'guys'

122211111111222211212111222221111212.content:
Renji says, "Sorry, but I can't. I have to deliver a report to Captain Kuchiki, and I'm already late. See ya guys later."

Ichigo and Lilynette wave as he leaves.

Lilynette looks down at Ichigo with a smirk, "What about you, short stuff? You have somewhere to be?"

Lilynette bent over as Ichigo punched his former body in the stomach, and with his normal scowl said, "Don't call me short stuff."

Lilynette groaned, "G-Got it."

When the former arrancar raised her head, she saw Ichigo paying the entrance to the hot springs.

Ichigo looked back, still with his normal scowl, and asked, "I paid for both of us, so come on already!"

Lilynette rolled her brown eyes and began walking over, only to be stopped by a very old Soul Reaper, who grabbed her arm.

The old Soul Reaper asked, "Is that your daughter? She's so full of energy, that one. Better keep an eye on her."

Lilynette yanked her arm back, and turned her face away so that no one could see her blush, as she ran over to Ichigo.

Ichigo asked, "What took you so long?"

Lilynette grumbled, "Some old hag thought that you were my daughter. Can you believe that?"

Ichigo snorted, "Can you imagine me calling you 'daddy?' HA!"

Unknown to them, Captain Kurotsuchi was nearby, trying to find anyone relaxed enough not to cause a scene should he want to experiment on them, and overheard them, "Hmm...it might be interesting to see if I could create a bond of admiration on that little arrancar to his old body. If it succeeds, then I could make people much more eager for me to experiment on them."
122211111111222211212111222221111212.title: Just the swapped people

choices: They get into the hot springs
1222111111112222112121112222211112121.content:
Lilynette asked, "Do you have anything to wear for the hot springs?"

Ichigo shrugged, "I figured I could just take off the Soul Reaper robes, and just wear what's underneath. You?"

Lilynette answered, "Got a new bathing suit, figured I'd just use that."

Ichigo shrugged, "Cool."

They went their separate ways to change and take a quick (mandatory) shower and met up at the other side.

Ichigo looked at his former body with a slightly horrified look, "Are you wearing...an SWA (Shinigami Women's Association) bathing suit?"

Lilynette snickered, "Yeah, they gave these to me for free if I agreed to wear them."

Ichigo's face flushed, "Well...it's kind of embarrassing to see my old body wearing a bathing suit with Yoruichi in her cat form on it!"

Lilynette snickered and patted Ichigo's head, "Well, I am wearing this, so let's just get into the hot spring now."
1222111111112222112121112222211112121.title: Swimming outfits

12221111111122221121211122222111121212.content: Does a paparazzi see them and decide to interview them?
12221111111122221121211122222111121212.title: Interview?

12221111111122221121212.content: Does Ichigo run out of the room, wearing nothing but a towel and a mask fragment?
12221111111122221121212.title: Run!

122211111111222212.content: Ichigo put a toe in the water, thought it was a good temperature, and was about to get into the bath tub. But then the door opened a little and Ichigo yelled in her new voice, “Don't come in!” When the door was still opening, Ichigo saw a towel on the towel rack, jumped towards it, and covered a decent amount of her body before the person walked in and could see anything.
122211111111222212.title: Who is it?

choices: It's leftover chemicals that were put on the sword to body swap
12221111112.content: … the liquid fell right next to her. It gave off a terrible smell that made Ichigo wrinkle her nose. Ichigo asked the arrancar who dropped it, “What is that stuff?” the arrancar, with a very pale face, answered, “…
12221111112.title: What is it?

122211111122.content: Is it an unknown chemical?
122211111122.title: other

12221112.content: “Hmm… What should I do now,” Lilinette said to himself before continuing, “should I go to Ichigo's school and live his life or lord Aizens plan?”
12221112.title: Lilinette's P.O.V.

122212.content: Cyan Sung-Sun?(snake girl of Halibel's subordinates)
122212.title: Other

choices: Shunsui, due to being a captain with high access to restricted areas.
1222121.content:
Sung-Sun raises a sleeved arm. "I will partake in your experiment, Lord Aizen. It would be better than being stuck with these two idiots." Her compatriots, angered, almost yell at her, but suppress their rage when they realize that Aizen is watching.

Aizen calmly states, "Very well. Come. You will have to study our files on the one you are to switch with. The device shall also be used to swap the shinigami with each other. In their chaos, someone seeming a bit off will be the least of their concerns, which should allow you easy access to their plans for stopping us from creating an ouken."

Sung-Sun bows as she replies, "As you wish, Lord Aizen."

Sung-Sun follows Aizen out of the room, her two partners glaring at her as she sticks her tongue out at them as she leaves. Halibel looks concerned for her fraccion, but accepts the need and leaves the room without a word.

Whom does Aizen choose to switch Sung-Sun with?
1222121.title: Sung-Sun

choices: Reader's choice (Other start or same start)
12221212.content:
"Here is the profile of the host you will be taking. Judging from your personality, you would have no problems carrying out your duties as her. Any questions?" Aizen commanded.

After looking through the profile of her new body. Sung-Sun lifted down her hand from face and grinned, showing signs of approval.

"Very well then. Let us begin." Aizen said while lifting the cloth from a certain object right behind him.

"This.. Is the body switching device that allows you to enter your host's body in Soul Society from Hueco Mundo. It only allows you to travel to and fro ONCE! However, it allows you to switch other people's body limitlessly." Aizen said with utmost seriousness." which has been our plan all awhile of course." reminded Aizen.

"Only and only return when you are in dire situations. And of course you can switch yourself around. When you are ready, go immediately. I hope to hear good results. Especially from Halibel's fraccion. Don't let her down." Aizen said, convincing her.

"Yes i will, Aizen-sama!" Sung-Sun bowed and pressed onto the blue button.

Extra information on the device :
Red Button : Switches 2 people.
Blue button : Send you to and fro from Hueco Mundo to Society. (Can only be activated twice)
There is a character selection device, pick two people and activate the button. If sungsan wants to switch, she would just have to point at someone else and select the red button.

Sung-Sun then selects ______ as her host and activates her device. The device disappears along with her and her lifeless body slumps onto the hard cold ground. With a snap from Aizen, Tousen comes in and locks Sung-Sun's body in a cage while waiting for the unfortunate host to be switched into Sung-San's body. Aizen smirked while he rested on his chair hoping for good results.

Whose body did Sung-Sun got hold of?

122212121.content:
Unohana Retsu, the 4th squad captain, was making her usual rounds around her 4th squad barracks, ensuring the comfort and safety of all the illed and injured in her barracks. When she was about to make her way to her room, she felt an electricifying shock within her body, causing a great surge of pain as she slumped onto the floor. Coincidentally, Isane happened to see her Captain lying on the floor and quickly rushed to her aid.

Unohana's POV
After what seemed like eternal darkness for Unohana, she finally awoke,, only to see familiar faces right infront of her. She was shocked and wanted to pull out her sword. But there was NOTHING. She stretched out her hands and realized they were sleeved. She felt different and screamed in fear, "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME AIZEN?..." Unohana in Sung-Sun's body paused, realizing her voice was a bit off too.

"My oh my, what do we have here? A helpless little hollow trapped behind this cage. This is the first time I have seen you, Unohana, cower in fear. That's right, you are not in your own body anymore. Your body is probably causing chaos in Soul Society and by the time you return to your body. Soul Society would probably have fallen. Sit there and enjoy that new body of yours as you watch Soul Society fall. There is nothing you can do now." Aizen laughed filling the atmosphere with his evil laughter.

Unohana helpless tried to think of ways to break free from this cage to save Soul Society.

Sung-Sun's POV

(Sung-Sun will still be called Sung-Sun even in Unohana's body)

At the same time, Sung-Sun was regaining consciousness and awoke to see Isane's worried look on her face. Sung-Sun, forgetting she was now in Unohana's body slipped out of character, and told her to go away. Immediately, she closed her mouth as she realized her new surroundings. Finally realizing her situation, she tried to alleviate the situation and stay-in-character. "Ops sorry. I don't know what happened to me Isane. Please forgive me." Sung-Sun said and got up by herself.

"It's okay Captain Unohana.. You must have had a rough day today, let me send you to your room.

"Yes I guess I certainly had.." Sung-Sun heaved a sigh of relief, passing the first round as Unohana as she allowed the insanely tall Isane guide her to her host's room.

Since it was late at night, Sung-San decided to rest and wait till tmr. A captain walking around late at this hour would probably be suspected.. Sung-San just doze off to sleep without even taking note of where the device was.

The next morning...
Sung-Sun woke up and was ready for the plan..
122212121.title: Unohana Retsu

1222121211.content:
Sung-Sun woke up to a bad start in the morning. She frantically searched around her sleeping area but to no avail. She would probably be killed by Aizen if she did not find it quickly. Leaving her room quickly, she retraced her steps last night trying to look for it. As she was busy looking for the device, she bumped into Isane accidentally.

Isane who seemed afraid, apologise repeatedly and asked why Sung-Sun seemed like she was in a rush.

Thinking that having more aid in searching would be helpful. She told Isane that she was looking for a black device which looked like a mini box. Isane snapped her fingers. "Ah.. You mean this little black box captain? I found this on the doorway last night." Isane said as she took it out from her pocket.

Sung-Sun immediately snatched it from her hands.

"Woah.. I could have just passed it to you if you asked Captain Unohana. You seemed to be acting strange since last night." Isane explained.

"I'm probably.. Under alot of stress recently Isane. Sorry.." sung-San said

"Well.. If you say so.. I will be off now" Isane said as she left you.

Phew.. She sighed. Could her day get any better than this? She hid the device in her haori that every captain had. Being in one of the most senior and respectable body in soul society. Aizen was sure nobody would suspect Unohana. Aizen also reminded that the 2 characters must be close enough for the switch to happen.

Sung-Sun left the barracks, only to see Soi Fon and Omaeda rushing to somewhere. Considering the difference in power and size, Sung-San felt that it will definitely be a good switch to make. Quickly, the switch was made And little did they realise, they got switched and made their way.
1222121211.title: Reader's choice

141.content: Who will Nel swap with?
141.title: Nel

1411.content:
-This takes place right after Ichigo, Uryu, and Chad meet Nel and her brothers-

Nel was staring up at Ichigo, amazed that he saved her from being crushed by her brothers.

Ichigo put her down, and asked, "Are you all right?"

Nel nodded, "Nel's fine."

Ichigo smiled, "Good."

He noticed something shiny in the sand, "Is that yours?"

Nel looked down, and saw it.

She shook her head, but bent down to push the sand away from it to see what it was.

Ichigo bent down as well, "Hold on, Nel. It could be dan-"

Ichigo grabbed her hand to stop her from touching it, but accidentally touched it himself.

The device sucked up most of his spiritual power, before letting loose a painful zap to both Ichigo and Nel.

They both scream, and their friends run over, unsure of what to do.

A few seconds later, the zap stops, and a breaking sound is heard.

Ichigo and Nel were rubbing their heads.
1411.title: Ichigo

14113.content:
How about this? It's been a few years since Aizen lost the war, Ichigo's body is 18 years old, and Nel is still controlling it. When Nel first took control of Ichigo's body, the mindset was still that of a young child's, but after a few weeks, it completely adjusted, so Nel's personality is like that of the adult Nel's now. Nel has more or less accepted his/her current body and has adjusted pretty well to Ichigo's life and even bought an apartment to live in with his 'daughter.'

Ichigo, on the other hand, is still adjusting. A few months ago, Kisuke created a gigai that works with hollows and arrancars, and made it similar to the first one he gave to Rukia. Similar, as in, it won't get rid of the inhabitant's spiritual powers, but it will turn them into an ordinary human if not regularly taken off, which Ichigo does to avoid creating a chain of fate, but wears it enough to age his/her current body. Also, (since gigai and human bodies seem to work best with those that are physically closest to them) Ichigo's gigai looks like Nel without the mask.

Just before Ichigo got the gigai, Nel moved out of the Kurosaki clinic into a nearby apartment, and teaches martial arts, sword fighting, and some other stuff to make money. After Ichigo got the gigai, Nel adopted the former human, and on the official papers, it says that Ichigo Kurosaki owns the apartment and lives there with his 5 year old daughter, Nel.( Mandatory education does not start until the age 6 in Japan, so Ichigo still has a few months (April-the month Nel was born and the month school starts in Japan) before he/she has to go to school.) Ichigo was told to call Nel 'daddy,' 'dad,' or 'papa,' and after months of prodding, Ichigo finally gave in. Nel was told to call Ichigo 'Nel,' or some nickname in order to avoid anyone being suspicious of them. Nel understood why, and did not hesitate to do so. But, when they're alone, they sometimes call each other by their real names.

Ichigo is also going to the school for Soul Reapers after regular school in order to better understand how to use spiritual pressure, the captains ordered the child to attend.

So, Ichigo is annoyed, especially since Nel's body wasn't potty-trained, so he/she has to re-learn that too.

If you like this idea, press 'continue' for further details. Otherwise, click 'other.'
14113.title: Story ideas

1411312.content:
An orange-haired man opened a door to see his officially adopted daughter, Nel, sleeping on a couch while a few other kids were running around.

He walked over to her, and careful not to wake her up, picked her up, and started walking to his car, giving the occasional wave to a work friend.

Once in the car, he buckled his former body up in a carseat and sat down in the driver's seat before starting the car. The real Ichigo, in Nel's body, woke up at the sound of the engine.

Nel, in Ichigo's body, noticed this, "Hey there, did I wake you?"

Ichigo just closed her eyes again, "'S fine."

Nel...

Grimmjow was still in pain after losing his arm to Tenzin as punishment , he was wondering the corridors of Las Noches plotting his revenge. Suddenly a mysterious device caught his eye. There was a rumour of a mythical body swap device that was banished to Heuco Mundo and from time to time it would reveal itself.
" I thought it was a myth... " , Grimmjow said picking it up. " I can use this device to get a stronger body and use it to get revenge on Tenzin " , Grimmjow plotted and clenched his fist.
Grimmjow had to face facts he didn't want to rely on another body's strength but having only one arm left meant that he lost a huge amount of his power.

" I wonder if Tier Harribel would let me use her body if I ask nicely or maybe I will just take it ! " , Grimmjow said with a smirk on his face.

after using the kon ray gun he noticed, he felt taller and the voice was not his, but Chizuru also noticed that his body was small and scared, then kon bursts Chizuru out of his sweet soul, at that moment he keeps his body and the sweet soul in the chizuru bag..

152132221.title: Yuzu

1522.content:
It was a bright and sunny summer day in Karakura City where our resident Substitute Soul Reaper Ichigo Kurosaki was working for his boss Mrs. Izumi. He was currently working on moving some boxes before heading home. “Hurry up!” Mrs. Izumi shouted. “I know I’m finishing up right now.” Ichigo said to her. “Jeez” he thought “She is never going to get a boyfriend at this rate. It’s not my fault my summer just started but it’s been boring I need some excitement or something interesting to happen.”
He was walking and saw many females out and about and was wondering what it would be like to see from their point of view. As he walked to his room, after giving his dad a good kick and greeting his sisters, he noticed a package on his desk. “Hey Yuzu, is the package for me?” “Why yes the package strictly said it was for you specifically and I made sure no one touched it.” Yuzu smiles warmly as she says it to her brother. Ichigo smiles warmly and gives her a pat on the head and thanks her. As Yuzu leaves he notices that their is no spiritual energy coming off the package and decides to open it. He made sure Kon the perverted lion was not around as he sent him with Kisuke on an expensive cruise for some much needed relaxation after the Quincy War. Yoruichi is still here and his friends Uryu and Chad Are our of town.
He opens it and finds a not saying “ Dear Ichigo Kurosaki, I know you have sacrificed so much and yet have received so little in return especially from the Soul Society so I offer you a gift. This watch has three functions Body Swap which allows you to switch with another person unnoticed. Trait swap which switches a personality or a physical trait of a person. And finally, the Life Swap which lets you switch with another person. When you switch with someone reality will change and no one will be the wiser, and the watch stays with you permanently and cannot work for anyone else. Enjoy this gift and have a good summer.”
Ichigo thought it was a joke but decided to try it out so when he put the watch on he noticed it scanned his DNA and started up for him. He decided to test it out on.
1522.title: Ichigo

15221.content: Ichigo went to look for his sisters and saw Yuzu in the kitchen and Karin look at the TV. He then saw his dad acting like a goofball and suddenly he got a wicked idea. He looked at the watch and asked if he could switch two people from other sides of the room. The watch showed that all he had to do was aim the watch at two people he wanted to swap. So Ichigo and decided to do Karin but what kind of swap should he do!
15221.title: Yuzu or Karin

152212.content: Ichigo used the body swap function and noticed that he was shorter and had black hair. He found a mirror and looked at his new face and was interested in being his sister and thought whether to stay this way for the day or switch back and sep with someone else.
152212.title: Body

1522121.content:
Deciding now that you tried it out time to switch back and do more tests. Hitting the reset button your back in your body in your room and started to go out tomorrow.
*Later that evening*
After dinner he noticed his Dad and Karin sitting next to each other watching a movie and Ichigo suddenly got a wicked idea. Using the trait swap Ichigo swapped his Dads manhood with Karins vagina. Ichigo sees his sister grow a bulge and his dads penis getting smaller. He walks up and asked Karin if she’s feeling well. “What do you mean big bro. I’m fine.” Karin said. “You do know you have a penis right, not a vagina considering your a girl.” Ichigo said acting concerned for his sister. “Ichigo there’s nothing to worry about I just had a special gift and personally I have been interested in a girl lately and I will say this she turns me on good.” Karin explains while grinding her legs together making her hot and bothered. Seeing this change Ichigo is interested in how this will affect her life so Ichigo says goodnight and went to bed.
1522121.title: Switch back

15221212.content:
Ichigo was about to go to sleep until he hears his badge go off alerting him of a hollow. He quickly ejected his body and rushed to see that the fish headed hollow was about to eat an innocent child. “Hey fish head!” Ichigo screamed. The hollow looked at him, “ Eat this, Getsuga Tensho!” Ichigo launder his signature move and checked on the girl to see if she’s okay and if her chains in good condition. He performs konsho and sends the soul to the Soul Society.
As he turns around he notices someone watching him and he quickly turned around and saw Rangiku walking around aimlessly with a sake bottle in her hand. “Ichigooooo!” Rangiku surprisingly ran without tripping into Ichigo and gave him a big hug. “Hey Rangiku, what are you doing here?” Ichigo asked as he hugged her. Hearing no response he saw her snoring on his shoulder and looked at her phone on the ground and quickly opened it to see the messages.
It was from Nanak who was trying to get in contact with Rangiku about the pool party with only the girls in a closed location. Ichigo thought about the opportunities to be a girl and smiled and texted in Rangiku’s place. “Sorry ran into Ichigo. I hope you don’t mind but I invited him and Yoruichi along for the ride. You cool with that I know I am:).”
After sending the message Ichigo took her to Urahara Shoten dumped her off in the hands of Yoruichi and went back home for the night

info.brief_description: Anything goes, anything...except bad grammar. 500 pts for a good chapter (not a question)
info.description:
Okay, the characters of Bleach find or create a body swapping machine. I don't have that many rules except: 1) No sex. You can say they had sex but no details! 2) Use good grammar! I have the right to delete any chapters with bad grammar. 3) No endings. 4) Please add and review.

P.S. A few chapters in this story can be found in http://www.Writing.Com/main/interact/item_id/1772487-The-transformation-adventur... BUT the only reason I'm using those chapters is because I wrote them!
